body_html:
over. Eom Seong Soo, HonestyandTrust CEO, Outlook<http://aka.ms/weboutlook>.
________________________________ 보낸 사람: drpngx <notifications@github.com> 보낸 날짜: 2017년 12월 29일 금요일 오후 12:20 받는 사람: tensorflow/tensorflow 참조: Subscribed 제목: Re: [tensorflow/tensorflow] //tensorflow/compiler/xla/tests:array_elementwise_ops_test_cpu_parallel test fails on ppc64le (#15266) Could you try --runs_per_test=100 as well?
On Fri, Dec 29, 2017, 2:02 AM sandipmgiri ***@***.***> wrote: Thanks for the reply @drpngx <https://github.com/drpngx> , now I 'm trying asan and msan builds. Also I observed that , for opt build as well this test passes using below command : ./bazel-bin/tensorflow/compiler/xla/tests/array_elementwise_ops_test_cpu_parallel — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#15266 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AT_SbUMkovHUqrX5-xBZRFN6Z-lu8MSBks5tFLjDgaJpZM4Q9I6N> .

over.

Eom Seong Soo, HonestyandTrust CEO, Outlook<http://aka.ms/weboutlook>.
________________________________
보낸 사람: drpngx <notifications@github.com>
보낸 날짜: 2017년 12월 29일 금요일 오후 12:20
받는 사람: tensorflow/tensorflow
참조: Subscribed
제목: Re: [tensorflow/tensorflow] //tensorflow/compiler/xla/tests:array_elementwise_ops_test_cpu_parallel test fails on ppc64le (#15266)

Could you try --runs_per_test=100 as well?
On Fri, Dec 29, 2017, 2:02 AM sandipmgiri ***@***.***> wrote:
 Thanks for the reply @drpngx <https://github.com/drpngx> , now I 'm
 trying asan and msan builds.

 Also I observed that , for opt build as well this test passes using below
 command :

 ./bazel-bin/tensorflow/compiler/xla/tests/array_elementwise_ops_test_cpu_parallel

 —
 You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
